events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to return it for a full refund. The product sent does not match what I purchased.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery being reported by the customer.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request concerning the incorrect item sent.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to assist you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the order number so we can verify and proceed with your refund?
I have attached photos of the incorrect product and here is my order number 12345678. Please let me know what to do next.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the wrong item at no cost.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the item back as soon as I receive the label.
The refund has been processed successfully and the return label was emailed to you yesterday. Please contact us if you need further help.
We just wanted to check in to ensure that you received the refund and that all return procedures went smoothly. Thank you for your patience.
Since the refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Feel free to reach out anytime.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience to help us improve our service.
